title: Fantastic Flying Machines
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 457 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 580L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and P		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and P
description: Fantastic Flying Machines is an informational book about the history behind the human flight. Photographs and illustrations support the text.
highFrequencyWords: blimp, cargo, hang glider, helicopter, hot-air balloon, jet engine, parachute, propeller, space shuttle, troops
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Y : Understand the use of y as a vowel
phonics: Compound Words                : Identify and create compound words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
